      public Enquiry submitEnquiry(String submitterNric, int projectId, String content)
      Description copied from interface: IEnquiryService
      Submits a new enquiry for a specific project.
      Specified by:
      submitEnquiry in interface IEnquiryService
      Parameters:
      submitterNric - NRIC of the user submitting.
      projectId - ID of the project.
      content - The enquiry text.
      Returns:
      The created Enquiry object, or null on failure.

    • editEnquiry

      public boolean editEnquiry(int enquiryId, String newContent, String editorNric)
      Description copied from interface: IEnquiryService
      Edits the content of an existing enquiry. Only the submitter can edit, and usually only if OPEN/ANSWERED.
      Specified by:
      editEnquiry in interface IEnquiryService
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - ID of the enquiry to edit.
      newContent - The updated enquiry text.
      editorNric - NRIC of the user attempting the edit (for verification).
      Returns:
      true if edit successful, false otherwise.

    • deleteEnquiry

      public boolean deleteEnquiry(int enquiryId, String deleterNric)
      Description copied from interface: IEnquiryService
      Deletes an enquiry. Only the submitter can delete.
      Specified by:
      deleteEnquiry in interface IEnquiryService
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - ID of the enquiry to delete.
      deleterNric - NRIC of the user attempting deletion (for verification).
      Returns:
      true if deletion successful, false otherwise.

      Description copied from interface: IEnquiryService
      Retrieves all enquiries across all projects. For Manager view.
      Specified by:

      Returns:

    • replyToEnquiry

      public boolean replyToEnquiry(int enquiryId, String replierNric, String replyText)
      Description copied from interface: IEnquiryService
      Adds a reply to an enquiry. Typically done by Officer or Manager handling the project.
      Specified by:
      replyToEnquiry in interface IEnquiryService
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - ID of the enquiry to reply to.
      replierNric - NRIC of the Officer/Manager replying.
      replyText - The reply content.
      Returns:
      true if reply added successfully, false otherwise.

    • closeEnquiry

      public boolean closeEnquiry(int enquiryId, String closerNric)
      Description copied from interface: IEnquiryService
      Marks an enquiry as closed (optional feature).
      Specified by:
      closeEnquiry in interface IEnquiryService
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - ID of the enquiry to close.
      closerNric - NRIC of the user closing (for permission check).
      Returns:
      true if closed successfully.
